Mari is a senior at UCLA majoring in Statistics and Data Science, set to graduate in June 2025. After graduation, she will be moving to Chicago to pursue a full time role as a data scientist. When not working with data, Mari spends her time baking (she has recently started a little bakery out of her college apartment) and creating shortform video content.
